# [Interview #1110: WOR-Scottsdale, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1110#5)

#### the\_archduke

Does Hoid have all the abilities of the planets he's visited?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Not yet.
